bug.author: taeklee
bug.summary: Typo in TensorFlow Core Tutorials - Image classification
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/images/classification.ipynb>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/images/classification.ipynb</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Typo <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Create the model The model consists of three convolution blocks with a max pool layer in each of them. There's a fully connected layer with 512 units on top of it thatr is activated by a relu activation function. </denchmark-code>
In Create the model section, thatr should be that <denchmark-code>Create the model The model consists of three convolution blocks with a max pool layer in each of them. There's a fully connected layer with 512 units on top of it that is activated by a relu activation function. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>

comments.comment:
Thanks for the report. Can you please make a pull request? This doc lives here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/images/classification.ipynb>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/images/classification.ipynb</denchmark-link>
If not familiar, check out this section in the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs#interactive_notebooks>TensorFlow doc contributor guide</denchmark-link> .
Thank you for review the issue. Can you please check out the pull request I made? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/pull/1148>tensorflow/docs#1148</denchmark-link>
